page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: THIS AREA IS A RURAL AREA LYING SOUTH WEST OF THE CITY OF YORK AND DUE SOUTH OF THE TOWN OF TADCASTER.THE RIVER WHARFE, A TRIBUTARY OF THE RIVER OUSE RUNS ACCROSS THE NORTH EASTERN CORNER OF THE AREA.THERE ARE THREE SETTLEMENTS IN THE AREA.THE LARGEST IS THE VILLAGE OF ULLESKELF WHICH IS TO THE EAST.TOWTON, TO THE WEST AND KIRKBY WHARFE,TO THE NORTH ARE ABOUT THE SAME WITH POPULATIONS OF ABOUT 80.THERE ARE ISOLATED FARMS AT NORTH MILFORD AND WEST MILFORD.IN THE ORIGINAL DOMESDAY SURVEY THE PLACE NAMES WERE AS FOLLOWS. ULLESKELF OLESCHEL TOWTON TOUETON KIRKBY WHARFE CHIRCHEBI MILFORD MILEFORD
